rooms.title: Silent Market
rooms.description: Stalls stand ready for traders that never quite arrive.

items.name: Sealed Trade Ledger
items.description: Wax sigils glow faintly, promising fortunes to whoever breaks the seal.

items.name: String of Chimes
items.description: Each bell rings a different currency when shaken.

rooms.title: Clocktower Plaza
rooms.description: Bronze numerals circle overhead, raining punctuality on anyone who lingers too long.

rooms.title: Clocktower Belfry
rooms.description: Giant chimes hang silent between beats, storing up the next note like a held breath.

rooms.title: Parade Concourse
rooms.description: Banners ripple despite the still air, rehearsing applause for the next celebration.

rooms.title: Festival Stage
rooms.description: A polished wooden stage awaits performers, enchanted spotlights following whoever dares step up.

rooms.title: Lantern Row
rooms.description: Paper lanterns float at shoulder height, escorting wanderers between market and garden paths.

rooms.title: Whispering Alley
rooms.description: Shuttered stalls gossip quietly, trading secrets as casually as coins.

rooms.title: Harbor of Gentle Tides
rooms.description: Bioluminescent currents lap at rune-carved docks where tide charts hum reassuring lullabies.

rooms.title: Harbor Lighthouse
rooms.description: A spiral beacon spins quiet halos, guiding both ships and errant daydreams back to shore.

rooms.title: Vaulted Storage
rooms.description: Crates levitate just above the floor, labeled in tidy handwriting that rearranges itself.

rooms.title: Shadow Vault
rooms.description: Cool darkness keeps rare curios safe; shadows queue patiently to be borrowed for disguises.
